meanings.def: the act of getting something, especially knowledge, a skill, etc.
something that somebody buys to add to what they already own, usually something valuable
examples: His latest acquisition is a racehorse.
The money will be spent on acquisitions for the university library.

meanings.def: a company, piece of land, etc. bought by somebody, especially another company; the act of buying it
examples: They have made acquisitions in several EU countries.
the acquisition of shares by employees
The group has announced its first overseas acquisition: a successful software company.
The company has just made another acquisition.
